front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for SMDS Interfaces using SMIv2

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for managing objects for SMDS access interfaces. This includes the following access protocols:
This memo replaces RFC 1304, and defines a MIB module which is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI and semantically-identical to the existing RFC 1304-based definitions.
This memo also assumes application of the MIB II Interfaces group as defined in.
